roles.description: Leading frontend delivery for Angular-based web applications, owning technical direction and execution.
achievements: Led and coordinated a frontend team of 3 engineers across multiple initiatives.
Defined frontend architecture, coding standards, and quality guidelines.
Mentored engineers and supported team growth through reviews and technical guidance.
Drove delivery of scalable, maintainable Angular features.
Integrated LLM and generative AI models into production Angular applications.

roles.description: Senior contributor to frontend and full-stack projects using Angular, React, and Next.js.
achievements: Improved maintainability and structure of existing frontend codebases.
Supported cross-stack tasks in collaboration with backend engineers.

roles.description: Lead Frontend Engineer responsible for technical direction and delivery in a remote setting. Developed the company marketing website with Gatsby and managed documentation with Docusaurus.
achievements: Built responsive React-based user interfaces aligned with design specifications.
Led development and maintenance of the company marketing site in Gatsby.
Curated and improved technical documentation using Docusaurus.
Collaborated closely with designers and backend engineers on MERN stack features.

roles.description: Full-stack developer for a social listening platform, working across backend APIs and frontend features.
achievements: Designed and maintained Node.js APIs consumed by Angular applications.
Implemented REST endpoints enabling seamless frontend-backend integration.
Delivered features across the stack in a fast-paced product environment.

roles.description: Senior frontend engineer for a B2B social listening suite, focused on feature delivery and UI quality.
achievements: Led frontend execution for an MVP delivered in approximately 3 months.
Designed reusable UI components and improved overall UX consistency.
Improved performance and stability while shipping new features.

roles.description: Team Leader and Senior Frontend Developer on enterprise B2B and B2C projects.
achievements: Led a team of developers on CNHi B2B/B2C applications.
Owned frontend delivery and coordination across multiple enterprise projects.
Designed and delivered PDF generation and consultation tools.
Contributed to the Miu Miu marketplace platform.

roles.description: Senior frontend engineer with team leadership responsibilities on enterprise solutions.
achievements: Acted as technical reference and team lead for CNHi frontend initiatives.
Delivered and maintained B2B and B2C applications (online and offline).
Supported development and maintenance of enterprise marketplace solutions.

Frontend developer for ERP and accounting software in the retail and textile sectors.
achievements: Developed ERP features for production tracking and inventory management.
